name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-Send-Inline-Image-In-Teams-Channel
title: Send Inline Image In Teams Channel
shortDescription: This sample gets the image from SharePoint document library and post it on Microsoft Teams channel using Power Automate.
longDescription: This sample gets the image from SharePoint document library and post it on Microsoft Teams channel using Power Automate.

references.name: Microsoft Power Platform documentation
references.description: Discover how to make the most of Microsoft Power Platform products with online training courses, docs, and videos covering product capabilities and how-to guides.
